Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ponericin W6  (natural AMPs; antss, insects, arthropods,  invertebrates, animals; ZZI)

Literature Information.Literature: Zone of inhibition test at 0.4-0.5 mM. Active against Gram+ bacteria B. cereus CIP 6624, B. megaterium ATCC 9885, B. stearothermophilus CIP 675, B. subtilis ATCC 6623, E. faecalis CIP 636, L. lactis ssp. cremoris I116, S. pyogenes CIP 561, S. sanguinis CIP 55128, L. ivanovii LMA 94, L. monocytogenes ATCC 15313, M. luteus CIP 5345, S. aureus CIP 677,  S. aureus LMA, S. epidermidis CIP 53134, Gram- bacteria S. marcescens LMA TP,  and P. aeruginosa CIP A22. Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Orivel J, Redeker V, Le Caer JP, Krier F, Revol-Junelles AM, Longeon A, Chaffotte A, Dejean A, Rossier J.2001
Literature Information.Title: Ponericins, new antibacterial and insecticidal peptides from the venom of the ant Pachycondyla goeldii.
